3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" class="s10"></span></span><span style="top: -3.677em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal">n</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">RT</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.936em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="adiabatic-isentropic-thermodynamic-process">ADIABATIC / ISENTROPIC THERMODYNAMIC PROCESS<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#adiabatic-isentropic-thermodynamic-process" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div><p>→ Is a process in which the working substance neither receives or loses out heat to its surrounding during expansion or compression. This will only happen when the working substance remains thermally insulated so that no heat enters nor leaves the system.</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="characteristic-of-adiabatic-process">Characteristic of Adiabatic Process<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#characteristic-of-adiabatic-process" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h2></div><p>i) No heat enters nor leaves the system.
ii) Temperature of the gas changes because the work is done at the caused of internal energy.
iii) Change in internal energy is equal to the work done.</p><p>It's general formula: <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\gamma =</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.625em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.05556em;">γ</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span></span></span></span></span> Is the ration of the two specific heat.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>P</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">PV = C</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mtext>gamma</mtext><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mspace width="1em"></mspace><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">(\text{gamma}) \quad \gamma = \frac{C P}{C V}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s13"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">gamma</span></span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right: 1em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.05556em;">γ</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 2.0463em; vertical-align: -0.686em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 1.3603em;"><span style="top: -2.314em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" class="s10"></span></span><span style="top: -3.677em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">CP</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.686em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="derivations-of-its-formulas">Derivations of its Formulas<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a class="katex"><span class="km"><math fence="true">(</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\log \left( class="s17"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" 0.836em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="mclose delimcenter" style="top: 0em;"><span class="delimsizing size3">)</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Ex.1.</p><ol><li>1 Litre of Hydrogen gas at 0°C is suddenly isentropically compressed to half of its volume. Find the change in temp of the gas, if the ratio of the too specific heats for hydrogen is 1.4.</li></ol><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>0</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mtext>C</mtext><mo>+</mo><mn>273</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>273</mn><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msqrt><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">=</mo></msqrt><mn>1.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
V_1 = 1L \\
T_1 = 0^\circ \text{C} + 273 = 273K \\
V_2 = 0.5L \\
T_2 = \\
\sqrt{=} 1.4 \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 6em; vertical-align: -2.75em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="s19">K</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>CS CamScanne</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>log</mi><mo></mo><mn>2.6786</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>60205.997</mn><mn>0.427907</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>140698.794</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>γ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1.407</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
\text{b)} \quad \gamma = \frac{\log \left[ \frac{P_2}{P_1} \right]}{\log \left( \frac{V_1}{V_2} \right)} \\
\gamma = \log \frac{4 \times 10^5}{10^5} \\
\frac{\log \left( 0.15 \right)}{0.056} \\
\gamma = \frac{\log (4 \times 10^5)}{\log 2.6786} = \frac{60205.997}{0.427907} = 140698.794 \\
\gamma = 1.407 \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 8.058em; vertical-align: -3.779em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mopen nulldelimiter"></span><span class="mfrac"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.8451em;"><span style="top: -2.655em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">0.427907</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" class="s10"></span></span><span style="top: -3.394em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">60205.997</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.345em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mo">140698.794</span></span></span><span style="top: -0.091em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3.51em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.05556em;">γ</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mo">1.407</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 3.779em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-error" title="ParseError: KaTeX parse error: Double subscript at position 214: … R + C_V \\
C_P_̲1 = C_{P_2} \\
…" style="color: rgb(204, 0, 0);">\begin{array}{l}
\text{c)} \quad \mathrm{d} u = U_2 - U_1 = m C_V (T_2 - T_1) \\
\text{Two specific heats (Cp and Cv)} \\
R = C_P - C_V \quad \gamma = \frac{C_P}{C_V} \quad C_P = \gamma C_V \\
C_P = R + C_V \\
C_P_1 = C_{P_2} \\
R + C_V = \gamma C_V \\
R = \gamma C_V - C_V \\
R = C_V (\gamma - 1) \\
R = cV (\gamma - 1) \\
289.4 = C_V (1.4^{07}1) \\
C_V = \frac{289.4}{0.407} \\
C_V = 711.06 \\
C_V = 711.06 J \text{ kg} \text{K} \\
\end{array}</span></div><p>CS CamScanne</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mn>289.4</mn><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><mn>711.06</mn><mo separator="true">;</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>289.4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>711.06</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mi>K</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></mstyle></mstyle></menclose></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>u</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo fence="true">[</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo fence="true">]</mo></mrow><msqrt><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></msup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><mn>288</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><menclose notation="box"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mn>0.056</mn></mstyle></mstyle></mstyle></menclose></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mn>0.15</mn></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><mn>288</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.3733</mn><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mn>0.407</mn></msup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mfrac><mn>288</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.66964</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>288</mn><mn>0.66964</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>430.08</mn><mi>K</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>u</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>m</mi><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.18</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>711.06</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>430.08</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>288</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><menclose notation="box"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mn>127.9908</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>142.08</mn></mrow></mstyle></mstyle></mstyle></menclose></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>18184.93</mn><mi>J</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>18.18493</mn><mi>K</mi><mi>J</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
R = C_p - C_v \\
289.4 = C_p - 711.06; \\
C_p = 289.4 + 711.06 \\
= \boxed{1000, 46J/KgK} \\
du = U_2 - U_1 = m C_v (T_2 - T_1) \\
\frac{T_1}{T_2} = \left[ \frac{V_2}{V_1} \right]^{\sqrt{-1}} \\
\frac{288}{T_2} = \boxed{0.056} \\
0.15 \\
\frac{288}{T_2} = (0.3733)^{0.407} \\
\frac{288}{T_2} = 0.66964 \\
T_2 = \frac{288}{0.66964} = 430.08K \\
du = m C_v (T_2 - T_1) \\
= 0.18 \times 711.06 (430.08 - 288) \\
\boxed{127.9908 \times 142.08} \\
= 18184.93J \\
= 18.18493KJ \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 21.2656em; vertical-align: -10.3828em;"></span><span class="mo"><span \text{W.D} = \frac{P_2 V_2 - P_1 V_1}{\sqrt{-1}} = du \\
\text{Molecular mass of the gas.} \\
e) \quad M = \frac{R_u}{R} \\
= \frac{8314.1J}{289.4} \times 8.3141KJ/KgK \\
= 28.73Kg. \\

A system contains <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.15</mn><mtext></mtext><msup><mtext>m</mtext><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">0.15 \, \text{m}^3</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.81em;"></span><span class="mo">0.15</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">m</span></span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height:.81em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span> of gas at a pressure of 3.8 bar and <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msup><mn>150</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mtext>C</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">150^\circ \text{C}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mo">15</span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">0</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6741em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mbin mtight">∘</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">C</span></span></span></span></span></span>. It is expanded adiabatically till pressure falls to 1 bar. The gas is then heated at a constant pressure till its enthalpy increases by 70 KJ. Determine the total work done by the gas. Take <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>kJ</mtext><mtext></mtext><mtext>kg</mtext><mtext></mtext><mtext>K</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_p = 1 \, \text{kJ} \, \text{kg} \, \text{K}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.9694em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span class="s38"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">p</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s47"></span><span class="mo">1</span><span class="ms" class="mo">kg</span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">K</span></span></span></span></span></span>, <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>v</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.714</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>kJ</mtext><mtext></mtext><mtext>kg</mtext><mtext></mtext><mtext>K</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_v = 0.714 \, \text{kJ} \, \text{kg} \, \text{K}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s14"></span><span src="assets/images/image-20251216-e96bf6ee.jpeg" alt="img-16.jpeg"></p><p>CS</p><p>CamScanne</p><ol start="4"><li>0.336m³ of gas at 10 bars and 150°C expands adiabatically until its pressure is 4 bars. It is then compressed is thermally to its original volume. Find the final temp and pressure of the gas. Also determine the change in internal energy.</li></ol><p>Take <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>p</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.996</mn><mtext>&nbsp;kJ/kgK</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_p = 0.996 \text{ kJ/kgK}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.9694em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span class="s38"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">p</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s13"></span><span class="mo">0.996</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">&nbsp;kJ/kgK</span></span></span></span></span></span>, <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>V</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.703</mn><mtext>&nbsp;kJ/kgK</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_V = 0.703 \text{ kJ/kgK}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s14"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3283em;"><span class="s38"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span states that the pressure of a fixed mass of a gas is inversely proportional to the volume, provided the temp is kept constant.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s14"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s17"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Charle's law</p><p>→ It states that the volume of a fixed mass of a gas is directly proportional to its absolute temp provided pressure is kept constant.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" Lussac's law</p><p>→ It states that the pressure of a fixed mass of a gas is directly proportional to its absolute temp at a constant volume.</p><div class="math math-display"><span CamScanner</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="derivation-of-workdone-in-adiabatic-process">Derivation of workdone in Adiabatic Process.<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#derivation-of-workdone-in-adiabatic-process" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div><p>The general formulae, in adiabatic process:</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>P</mi><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mtext>hence;</mtext></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>P</mi><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
P V ^ {r} = C \\
P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} = P _ {2} V _ {2} ^ {r} = C \\
P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} = C \\
\text{hence;} \\
P V ^ {r} = P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} \\
P = \frac{P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r}}{V ^ {r}} \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 7.3872em; vertical-align: -3.4436em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span><span class="col-align-l"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 3.9436em;"><span style="top: -6.1308em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3.0272em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6644em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">r</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span></span></span><span style="top: -4.9308em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3.0272em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6644em;"><span style="top: -2.4519em; margin-left:-.22em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">r</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2481em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6644em;"><span style="top: -2.4519em; margin-left:-.22em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal formulae:</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" V</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.03785em;">δ</span><span class="s7">V</span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Integrating from state (1) to state (2)</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math style="height: 1.564em;"><span style="top: -1.7881em; margin-left: -0.4445em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span encoding="application/x-tex">W _ {1 - 2} = \int_ {1} ^ {2} P d V</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.8917em; vertical-align: -0.2083em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">W</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span><span class="mbin mtight">−</span><span mtight">1</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.8129em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.9119em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="mord mathnormal">d</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Substituting for P:</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup></mfrac><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msup><mi>V</mi><mi>r</mi></msup></mfrac><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><msubsup><mo>∫</mo><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msup><mi>V</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></msup><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup><msubsup><mrow><mo fence="true">[</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>V</mi><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo fence="true">]</mo></mrow><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><msubsup><mrow><mo fence="true">[</mo><msup><mi>V</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></msup><mo fence="true">]</mo></mrow><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mi>r</mi></msubsup></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo fence="true">[</mo><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></msubsup><mo>−</mo><msubsup><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></msubsup><mo fence="true">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
W _ {1 - 2} = \int_ {1} ^ {2} \frac {P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r}}{V ^ {r}} d V \\
= P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} \int_ {1} ^ {2} \frac {1}{V ^ {r}} d V = P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} \int_ {1} ^ {2} V ^ {- r} d V \\
= P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r} \left[ \frac {V ^ {- r + 1}}{- r + 1} \right] _ {1} ^ {2} \\
= \frac {P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r}}{1 - r} \left[ V ^ {1 - r} \right] _ {1} ^ {2} \\
= \frac {P _ {1} V _ {1} ^ {r}}{1 - r} \left[ V _ {2} ^ {1 - r} - V _ {1} ^ {1 - r} \right] \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 7.6978em; vertical-align: -3.5989em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span><span class="col-align-l"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 4.0989em;"><span style="top: -6.4257em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3.354em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">W</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span><span class="mbin mtight">−</span><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2083em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mop"><span class="mop op-symbol small-op" style="margin-right: 0.19445em; position: relative; top: -0.0006em;">∫</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 1.009em;"><span style="top: -2.3442em; margin-left: -0.1945em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" a negative sign.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" expansion</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">W_{1-2} = \frac{P_2 V_2 - P_1 V_1}{r - 1}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.8917em; vertical-align: -0.2083em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">W</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: compression,</p><p>an example is the expansion of combustion gases in the cylinder of a water cooled reciprocating engine</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 0.836em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>CS CamScanne</p><p>2.) <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mi>D</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">W_{1}D</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s14"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">W</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3011em;"><span class="s8"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">D</span></span></span></span></span> in PolyTropic</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mspace scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>W</mi><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>R</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
W_{pol} = \frac{P_1 V_1 - P_2 V_2}{n-1} \quad \text{(For expansion)} \\
\\
W_{pol} = \frac{P_2 V_2 - P_1 V_1}{n-1} \quad \text{(For compression)} \\
\\
W_{pol} = \frac{m R (T_1 - T_2)}{n-1}
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 6.3969em; vertical-align: -2.9484em;"></span><span class="mo"><span Heat Transferred (the only difference with Adiabatic process)</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>φ</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>C</mi><mi>V</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>r</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\varphi = C_V (T_2 - T_1) (n-r)</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.625em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">φ</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" mtight" class="s7">V</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">T</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: class="b"><span class="st" class="s13"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" style="margin-right: 0.02778em;">r</span><span class="mclose">)</span></span></span></span></span></div><p><em>Otto cycle → is a constant volume cycle.</em></p><p>1.) A certain quantity of air has a volume of <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.028</mn><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">0.028m^3</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.81em;"></span><span class="mo">0.028</span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal">m</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height:.81em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span> at a pressure of 1.25 bar and <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msup><mn>25</mn><mo>∘</mo></msup><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">25^\circ C</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mo">2</span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">5</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.6741em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mbin mtight">∘</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span></span></span></span></span>. It is compressed to a volume of <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mn>0.0042</mn><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">0.0042m^3</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.81em;"></span><span class="mo">0.0042</span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal">m</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height:.81em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span>. According to the law <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mi>P</mi><msup><mi>V</mi><mn>1.3</mn></msup><mo>≈</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">PV^{1.3} \approx C</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.81em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height:.81em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mtight">1.3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">≈</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span></span></span></span></span>, find the final temp and work done during compression. Also determine the reduction in pressure at a constant volume required to bring the air back to its original temp</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.25em" columnalign="right left" columnspacing="0em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>p</mi><mo separator="true">;</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0.028</mn><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>1.25</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup></mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mfrac></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" separator="true">;</mo><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.15</mn><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mn>1.3</mn></msup></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" separator="true">;</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0.084902</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{aligned}
\frac{298}{T_2} &amp;amp;= (0.15)^{0.3} \\
\frac{298}{T_2} &amp;amp;= 0.5660 \\
T_2 &amp;amp;= \frac{298}{0.5660} = 526.49K \text{ or } 253.49^\circ \\
\frac{P_1}{P_2} &amp;amp;= \left[ \frac{V_2}{V_1} \right]^n \\
\frac{1.25 \times 10^5}{P_2} &amp;amp;= \left[ \frac{0.0042}{0.028} \right]^{1.3} \\
\frac{125000}{P_2} &amp;amp;= (0.15)^{1.3} \\
\frac{125000}{P_2} &amp;amp;= 0.084902
\end{aligned}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 17.7956em; vertical-align: -8.6478em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>W</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">.</mi><mi>D</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>V</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1080000</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.096</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>90000</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1.15</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">W.D = \frac{P_2 V_2 - P_1 V_1}{n - 1} = (1080000 \times 0.096) - (90000 \times 1.15)</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="mo">0.25</span></span></span><span style="top: -3.23em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="frac-line" class="s10"></span></span><span style="top: -3.677em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">9073</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.686em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mclose nulldelimiter"></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 1.204em; vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mo">3629.2</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">J/kg</span></span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.954em;"><span style="top: -3.2029em; margin-right: 0.05em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">2</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><hr><p>Heat engine cycle.</p><p>At heat is transferred from furnace to boiler.</p><p>At work is produced in turbine rotor.</p><p>At steam is condensed in condenser.</p><p>Operation of carnot cycle.</p><p>Boiler generates steam at high pressure and higher temp. The steam turbine converts to heat energy of the steam into mechanical energy.</p><p>The generator then converts to mechanical energy into electric power.</p><p><img src="assets/images/image-20251216-8fe7ef5d.jpeg" alt="img-17.jpeg"></p><p>CS CamScanne</p><p>CS CamScanner</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="c9189533">STEAM POWER PLANTS → It undergoes a cyclic process.<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#c9189533" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="vapour-cycles">Vapour Cycles<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#vapour-cycles" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h2></div><p>→ The working substance is steam. It can be
① wet steam, Dry steam, Saturated steam and
in Substituent steam.</p><p>→ The steam power plant vapour cycles are:
① Carnot cycle
② Rankine
③ Rankine wit Supeshest</p><p>→ If efficiency can be increased by decreasing the lowest temp.
→ (Net change of internal energy in a steam power plant is zero)</p><p>→ It has the following parts.
• Boiler
• Turbine
• Condenser
• Compressor</p><p>→ It is a reversible cycle. Can ideal hypothetical cycle?
① Schematic diagram of a Carnot cycle.</p><p>Quasistatic → Isothermal → Steam turbine (work output) → adiabatic</p><p>(heat is received)
Pin ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑
↑ ↑ ↑</p><p>→ Condenser → (heat is rejected)
Pout → Isothermal → (work input)
→ Compressor (work input)
Win</p><ul><li>Entropy: (S) Jlkgk or KJlkgk.
→ It is the level of disorder in a system
→ Increase in temp increases entropy.
T ∝ S → Increase in entropy increases temperature
→ T = KS</li></ul><p>② P-V diagram of a Carnot cycle.</p><p><img src="assets/images/image-20251216-ef66b4ce.jpeg" alt="img-18.jpeg"></p><p>Joules work</p><ul><li>heat is a low grade energy</li><li>work is a high grade energy</li><li>complete conversion of low grade energy into high grade energy in a cycle is impossible</li></ul><p>③ T-S diagram of a Carnot cycle.</p><div class="v" style="height: 0.15em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">&nbsp;(JkgK)</span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>Efficiency of a Carnot cycle → Is the ratio of work done by the working substance in one cycle to the amount of heat extracted from the source?</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mtext>Efficiency</mtext><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mtext>Work&nbsp;output</mtext><mtext>Work&nbsp;input</mtext></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mtext>net&nbsp;work&nbsp;output</mtext><mtext>total&nbsp;heat&nbsp;input</mtext></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\text{Efficiency} = \frac{\text{Work output}}{\text{Work input}} = \frac{\text{net work output}}{\text{total heat input}}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s47"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">Efficiency</span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mtext>Work&nbsp;done</mtext><mtext>Heat&nbsp;extracted</mtext></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mi>c</mi></msub></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">n = \frac{\text{Work done}}{\text{Heat extracted}} = \frac{(S_2 - S_1)(T_1 - T_3)}{(S_2 / S_1) T_1} = \frac{T_1 - T_3}{T_1} = \frac{T_1}{T_1} - \frac{T_3}{T_1} = \frac{1 - T_3}{T_1} = n_c</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.4306em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">n</span><span class="ms" supplied with dry saturated steam at a pressure of 16 bars and exhausted at 0.2 bars. Using steam tables find the efficiency of the Carnot cycle.</li></ol><p><img src="assets/images/image-20251216-4b7a9ec0.jpeg" alt="img-20.jpeg"></p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" class="mo">1</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 2.1963em; vertical-align: class="mo">29.78%</span></span></span></span></span></div><ul><li>Heat transfer into a system is more than work transfer out of the system? What happens?</li></ul><p>→ Internal energy of the system remains constant.</p><ul><li>The term which can differentiate thermodynamic from other science is? Temperature</li></ul><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="rankine-cycle">RANKINE CYCLE<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#rankine-cycle" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div><p>→ Coal-fired Power Plants or Nuclear Reactors.</p><p>→ It is the ideal cycle for finding the performance of a steam plant:
→ It is also called a modified Carnot cycle. ☑</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="components-of-rankine-cycle">Components of Rankine Cycle<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#components-of-rankine-cycle" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h2></div><ol><li>Boiler</li><li>Turbine</li><li>Condenser</li><li>Extraction Pump</li><li>Hotwell</li><li>Feed Pump</li></ol><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h2 level="2" id="schematic-diagram-of-rankine-cycle">Schematic diagram of Rankine Cycle<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#schematic-diagram-of-rankine-cycle" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h2></div><p><img src="assets/images/image-20251216-dd9df9da.jpeg" alt="img-21.jpeg"></p><p>CS CamScanne</p><p>CS CamScanne</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>P</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>V</mi><mtext>&nbsp;diagram</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">P - V \text{ diagram}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.7667em; vertical-align: -0.0833em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s6">P</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s47"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">&nbsp;diagram</span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="center" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>⇒</mo><mtext>isobaric</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>⇒</mo><mtext>Isentropic/Adiabatic</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>⇒</mo><mtext>Isobaric</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>⇒</mo><mtext>Isentropic/adiabatic</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{c}
1 - 2 \Rightarrow \text{isobaric} \\
2 - 3 \Rightarrow \text{Isentropic/Adiabatic} \\
3 - 4 \Rightarrow \text{Isobaric} \\
4 - 1 \Rightarrow \text{Isentropic/adiabatic} \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 4.8em; vertical-align: -2.15em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span><span class="col-align-c"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 2.65em;"><span style="top: -4.81em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">1</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mo">2</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">⇒</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">isobaric</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -3.61em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">2</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mo">3</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">⇒</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">Isentropic/Adiabatic</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -2.41em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">3</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mo">4</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">⇒</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">Isobaric</span></span></span></span><span style="top: -1.21em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">4</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="ms" Calculate the Rankine efficiency using the steam tables.</li></ol><p><img src="assets/images/image-20251216-ada3f6be.jpeg" alt="img-24.jpeg"></p><div class="math math-display"><span scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>h</mi><msub><mi>f</mi><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi><mi>g</mi><mtext>&nbsp;at&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>P</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&nbsp;bars</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>1986</mn><mtext>&nbsp;kJ/kg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;(Lies&nbsp;on&nbsp;the&nbsp;curve)</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
Q_R = \frac{h_2 - h_3}{h_2 - hf_3} \\
h_2 = hf_2 + x_2 hf_{g_2} \\
hf_2 = hf \text{ at } P_1 = 12 \text{ bars} = 798 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
hf_{g_2} = hfg \text{ at } P_1 = 12 \text{ bars} = 1986 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
x = 1 \text{ (Lies on the curve)}
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 6.1773em; vertical-align: -2.8387em;"></span><span class="mo"><span displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>S</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>S</mi><mi>g</mi></msub><mtext>&nbsp;at&nbsp;boiler&nbsp;pressure</mtext><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext>&nbsp;bars</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6.523</mn><mtext>&nbsp;KJ/kg&nbsp;K</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
h_3 = h f_3 + x_3 h f_{g_3} \\
h f_3 = hf \text{ at } 0.1 \text{ bars} = 192 \text{ KJ/kg} \\
h f_{g_3} = hf_g \text{ at } 0.1 \text{ bars} = 2392 \text{ KJ/kg} \\
\text{get } x_3 \\
S_2 = S_3 \\
S_2 = S_g \text{ at boiler pressure} = 12 \text{ bars} \\
= 6.523 \text{ KJ/kg K} \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 8.4em; vertical-align: -3.95em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>192</mn><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.7832</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2392</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2065.41</mn><mtext>&nbsp;KJ/kg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">∇</mi><mi>R</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><munder><munder><mrow><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo stretchy="true">⏟</mo></munder><mrow><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mi>h</mi><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow></munder></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo fence="true">(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2784</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2065.41</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2784</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>192</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo fence="true">)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2772</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>27.72</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">✓</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
S_3 = S f_3 + x_3 S f_{g_3} \\
S f_3 = S f \text{ at condenser pressure at } 0.1 \text{ bars} \\
= 0.649 \text{ KJ/kg K} \\
S f_{g_3} = S f_g \text{ at condenser pressure at } 0.1 \text{ bars} \\
= 7.5 \text{ KJ/kg K} \\
\text{Since } S_2 = S_3 \\
S_3 = S f_3 + x_3 S f_{g_3} \\
6.523 = 0.649 + (x_3 \times 7.5) \\
6.523 = 0.649 + 7.5 x_3 \\
6.523 - 0.649 = 7.5 x_3 \\
7.5 \\
x_3 = 0.7832 \\
h_3 = h f_3 + x_3 h f_{g_3} \\
= 192 + (0.7832 \times 2392) \\
= 2065.41 \text{ KJ/kg} \\
\nabla_R = \underbrace{h_2 - h_3}_{h_2 - h f_3} \\
= \left( \frac{2784 - 2065.41}{2784 - 192} \right) \times 100\% \\
= 0.2772 \times 100\% \\
= 27.72\% \checkmark \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 24.1135em; vertical-align: -11.8068em;"></span><span class="mo"><span CamScanner</p><div tid="stHeadingWithActionElements" class="ec-1p9ibxm e1icttdg2"><h1 level="1" id="csup-specific-heat-of-superheated-steam">Csup - Specific heat of superheated steam<span tid="stHeaderActionElements" class="ec-gi0tri e1icttdg3"><a href="#csup-specific-heat-of-superheated-steam" class="ec-yinll1 e1icttdg1"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"><path d="M15 7h3a5 5 0 0 1 5 5 5 5 0 0 1-5 5h-3m-6 0H6a5 5 0 0 1-5-5 5 5 0 0 1 5-5h3"></path><line x1="8" y1="12" x2="16" y2="12"></line></svg></a></span></h1></div><ol><li>4 Kg of 0.5 dry steam at 6 bar pressure is heated so that it becomes;
a) 0.95 dry at 6 bar pressure.
b) Superheated to 250°C at 8 bar
Using steam tables determine in each case the quantity of heat required to be supplied. Take <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><mtext>Kg</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><mtext>K</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">C_{sup} = 2.3 \, \text{KJ} \cdot \text{Kg} \cdot \text{K}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.9694em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s19">C</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span class="s38"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">s</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">u</span><span class="mord mathnormal mtight">p</span></span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mo">2.3</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">KJ</span></span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.8778em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">Kg</span></span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">⋅</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">K</span></span></span></span></span></span></li></ol><div class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>h</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2951</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>C</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mtext>Kg</mtext><mo>⋅</mo><mtext>K</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>u</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>250</mn><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">∘</mo></msup><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>t</mi><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>170.4</mn><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">∘</mo></msup><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2951</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2.3</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>250</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>170.4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>3134.08</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mtext>Kg</mtext><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>12536.32</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>φ</mi><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>12536.32</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6854</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5682.32</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
h g = 2951 \\
C_{sup} = 2.3 \, \text{KJ} / \text{Kg} \cdot \text{K} \\
t_{sup} = 250^{\circ} \text{C} \\
t_{sat} = 170.4^{\circ} \text{C} \\
h_2 = 2951 + 2.3 (250 - 170.4) \\
h_2 = 3134.08 \, \text{KJ} / \text{Kg} \times 4 \\
= 12536.32 \, \text{KJ} \\
\varphi = (12536.32 - 6854) \\
= 5682.32 \, \text{KJ} \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 10.8em; vertical-align: -5.15em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span><span class="col-align-l"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 5.65em;"><span style="top: -7.81em;"><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><ol start="2"><li>Consider 2Kg of steam with the following parameters, extracted from the table.</li></ol><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
h f = 720.9 \, \text{KJ} / \text{Kg} \\
h g = 2767.4 \, \text{KJ} / \text{Kg} \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 2.4em; vertical-align: -0.95em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span style="height: 0.95em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>If the dryness fraction is 0.8, calculate the total heat of the system.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" x = 0.8 \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 2.4em; vertical-align: -0.95em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s40">M</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>720.9</mn><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2767.46</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2933.968</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext><mi displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5869.736</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
\varphi = h_2 - h_1 \\
h_1 = h f_1 + x h f g_1 \\
h_1 = 720.9 + (0.8 \times 2767.46) \\
= 2933.968 \, \text{KJ} / \text{Kg} \times 2 \, \text{Kg} \\
= 5869.736 \, \text{KJ} \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 6em; vertical-align: -2.75em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span 2.75em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.16em" columnalign="left" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mn>720.9</mn><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2046.53</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mtext>Kg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2358.12</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mtext>Kg</mtext><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="false"><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>4716.248</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>KJ</mtext><mspace width="1em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">✓</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr></mtable><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">\begin{array}{l}
h = h f + x h f g \\
720.9 + (0.8 \times 2046.53) \, \text{KJ} / \text{Kg} \\
= 2358.12 \, \text{KJ} / \text{Kg} \times 2 \\
= 4716.248 \, \text{KJ} \quad \checkmark \\
\end{array}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 4.8em; vertical-align: -2.15em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mtable"><span class="arraycolsep" style="width: 0.5em;"></span><span class="col-align-l"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 2.65em;"><span style="top: -4.81em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal">h</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">h</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s43">f</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">+</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">x</span><span class="mord mathnormal">h</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s43">f</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s31">g</span></span></span><span style="top: -3.61em;"><span class="ps" style="height: 3em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mo">720.9</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">+</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mo">0.8</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">×</span><span class="ms" class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mo">2358.12</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span ratio of the mass of dry steam and the combined mass of dry steam and mass of water vapour in the mixture.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math mathrm">T</span></span></span></span></span></div><p>CS CamScanne</p><ol start="2"><li>A block of metal of mass 1.5 Kg which is suitably insulated is heated from 30°C to 50°C in 8 minutes and 20 seconds by an electric heater coil rated 54 watts. Find;</li></ol><p>a) The quantity of heat supplied by the heater.</p><p>b) The heat capacity of the block.</p><p>c) The specific heat capacity of the block.</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mtable rowspacing="0.25em" columnalign="right left" columnspacing="0em"><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mi>m</mi></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>p</mi><mo separator="true">;</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;Kg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">∅</mi></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>p</mi><mo separator="true">;</mo><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo displaystyle="true"><mtext>Time&nbsp;(t)</mtext></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow></mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>m</mi><mi>p</mi><mo mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow></mstyle></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0" displaystyle="true"><mi>P</mi></mstyle></mtd><mtd><mstyle scriptlevel="0"
