nulldelimiter"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2760.82</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">= 2760.82</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.3669em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mo">2760.82</span></span></span></span></span> KJ/kg.</p><p>CS CamScanne</p><ol start="2"><li>Steam at 120 bar has a specific Volume of 0.01721 m³/kg, find the temperature, enthalpy and the internal energy.</li></ol><p>i) At 120 bar, <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>V</mi><mi>g</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0143</mn><mtext></mtext><msup><mtext>m</mtext><mn>3</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mtext>kg</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">V_g = 0.0143 \, \text{m}^3/\text{kg}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.9694em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span class="s17"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" class="s31">g</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 1.0641em; vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mo">0.0143</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">m</span></span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height:.81em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo">/</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">kg</span></span></span></span></span></span>, which is less than the actual specific Volume of 0.01721 m³/kg and hence the steam is superheated.</p><p>From Superheat tables at 120 bar, the specific volume is 0.01721 m³/kg at a temperature of 350°C.</p><p>ii) Enthalpy</p><p>From the steam tables the specific enthalpy at 120 bar, 350°C</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2847.7</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>kJ/kg</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">h = 2847.7 \, \text{kJ/kg}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">h</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s13"></span><span class="mo">2847.7</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">kJ/kg</span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>iii) Internal energy</p><p>To find internal energy, using the equation</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>U</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>h</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">U = h - pV</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height:.68em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s40">U</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.7778em; vertical-align: -0.0833em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">h</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.8778em; vertical-align: -0.1944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">p</span><span class="mord mathnormal" class="s7">V</span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>U</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2847.7</mn><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>120</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mn>0.01721</mn></mrow><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>3</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2641.18</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>kJ/kg</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">.</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">U = 2847.7 - \frac{120 \times 10^5 \times 0.01721}{10^3} = 2641.18 \, class="mbin">−</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s13"></span><span class="mo">0.85</span><span class="mclose">)</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">×</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s28"></span><span class="mo">883</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">+</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s28"></span><span class="mo">0.85</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span><span class="mbin">×</span><span class="ms" class="s3"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.6444em;"></span><span class="mo">2598</span></span></span></span></span></div><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2340.75</mn><mtext></mtext><mtext>kJ/kg</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">= 2340.75 \, \text{kJ/kg}</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.3669em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.28em;"></span></span><span class="b"><span class="st" class="s13"></span><span class="mo">2340.75</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">kJ/kg</span></span></span></span></span></span></div><p>CS CamScanne</p><ol start="5"><li>If a certain amount of steam is produced at a pressure of 8 bar and dryness fraction 0.8, calculate</li></ol><p>i) External work done during evaporation.</p><p>ii) Internal latent heat of steam.</p><p>Pressure of steam, P = 8 bar</p><p>Dryness fraction, xc = 0.8</p><p>At 8 bar, from steam table,</p><p>8 x 10⁵ N/m². Vg = 0.240 m²/kg</p><p>hfg = 2046.5 KJ/kg</p><ol start="7"><li>External work done during Evaporation.</li></ol><p>= P × Vg = 8 x 10⁵ x 0.8 x 0.24 N/m.</p><p>= 8 x 10⁵ x 0.8 x 0.24</p><p>10³ = 153.6 KJ</p><p>ii) Internal latent heat</p><p>= xchfg - external work √</p><p>= 0.8 x 2046.5 - 153.6</p><p>UL = 1483.6 KJ √</p><ol start="6"><li>Find the dryness fraction, specific volume and internal energy of steam at 7 bar and enthalpy 2550 KJ/kg.</li></ol><p>Pressure of steam P = 7 bar</p><p>h = 2550 KJ</p><p>From steam tables corresponding to 7 bar pressure</p><p>hf = 697 KJ/kg</p><p>hfg = 2064.9 KJ/kg</p><p>Vg = 0.273 m²/kg</p><p>Uf = 696 KJ/kg</p><p>Ug = 2573 KJ/kg</p><p>h = hf + xchfg</p><p>Dryness fraction, xc</p><p>At 7 bar, hg = 2762 KJ/kg, hence since the actual enthalpy is given as 2550 KJ/kg, the steam must be in the wet vapour state.</p><p>CS CamScanne</p><p>Now using the equation</p><div class="math math-display"><span class="k-display"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><msub><mi>h</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">h = h_f + x h_f g</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.6944em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">h</span><span class="ms" -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal">h</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.3361em;"><span fraction, specific volume, and internal energy of steam at 7 bar and enthalpy 2600 KJ/kg.
<span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0.921</mn><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>0.2515</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mtext>m</mtext><mn>3</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mtext>kg</mtext><mo separator="true">,</mo><mn>2420</mn><mtext>&nbsp;KJ</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mtext>kg</mtext><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">(0.921, 0.2515\ \text{m}^3/\text{kg}, 2420\ \text{KJ}/\text{kg})</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 1.0641em; vertical-align:-.25em;"></span><span class="mopen">(</span><span class="mo">0.921</span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mo">0.2515</span><span class="ms">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo"><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">m</span></span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vt"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height:.81em;"><span class="s20"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mtight">3</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo">/</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">kg</span></span><span class="mpunct">,</span><span class="ms" style="margin-right:.17em;"></span><span class="mo">2420</span><span class="ms">&nbsp;</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">KJ</span></span><span class="mo">/</span><span class="mord text"><span class="mo">kg</span></span><span class="mclose">)</span></span></span></span></span></li></ol><p>At 7 bars, <span class="math math-inline"><span class="katex"><span class="km"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>h</mi><mi>g</mi></msub></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">h_g</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="kh"><span class="b"><span class="st" style="height: 0.9805em; vertical-align: -0.2861em;"></span><span class="mo"><span class="mord mathnormal">h</span><span class="msupsub"><span class="vlist-t vlist-t2"><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.1514em;"><span class="s35"><span class="ps" style="height: 2.7em;"></span><span class="sz"><span class="mord mathnormal mtight" class="s31">g</span></span></span></span><span class="vlist-s"></span></span><span class="vr"><span class="v" style="height: 0.2861em;"><span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span> is 2604 initial energy
